GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
x86/pm: Fix false positive kmemleak report in msr_build_context()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 6a97103fe022eaa443ce691ebf2601ebce1625e9, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit 7a9c2dd08eadd5c6943115dbbec040c38d2e0822. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: x86/pm: Fix false positive kmemleak report in msr_build_context()
